title: Analyze Soil Geochemical Data
description: An exploration geologist analyzes data from a soil sampling survey to identify anomalies that could indicate buried mineralization.

tasks.description: Import the soil sample locations and their assay results (e.g., copper, gold concentrations) into a GIS software.
tasks.expected_outcome: The geochemical data is loaded and displayed on a map.

tasks.description: Perform a statistical analysis of the data to define what constitutes an anomalous result (e.g., anything above the 95th percentile).
tasks.expected_outcome: A threshold for anomalous values is determined.

tasks.description: Create a contour map of the copper concentrations to visualize the size and shape of the anomalies, identifying targets for follow-up work.
tasks.expected_outcome: A map is generated that clearly shows several coherent anomalies worthy of further investigation.
